price: 86.Yi maraw keexoo kee miidaan duudussaanak lakal faydak siinih raqtam kayrih aysuk siinih raqta sinam cakki deedalal takmeenimik, isin nummah Yallal yaamine mara tekkeenik, anu sin taamoomi dacrisaah isin abtaanam loynisa num hinniyo keenik iyye.
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
